snippet.title: SRB2infinity  - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Download SRB2infinity on the SRB2 Message Board:
https://mb.srb2.org/addons/srb2infinity-a-phantasy-star-knockoff.5373/

---
SRB2infinity is a total convertion mod for Sonic Robo Blast 2 that turns it into a Phantasy Star game inspired by Phantasy Star Portable 2 Infinity.
It's been about 5 months in the making and is still pretty rough but I believe it's good enough for a first release!

You can find more information about the mod on the SRB2 Message Board thread. Hope you have fun playing this, cause I sure had a blast making it!

---
Music is "Ignite Infinity" from the Phantasy Star Portable 2 Infinity OST
